subject: Stanley Cup
Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: When Dustin Brown was mired in an offensive slump, it appeared the Kings might trade him, but he’s given the offense a lift with the help of Coach Darryl Sutter’s aggressive style.
snippet: When Dustin Brown was mired in an offensive slump, it appeared the Kings might trade him, but he’s given the offense a lift with the help of Coach Darryl Sutter’s aggressive style.
